name="processResponse"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="result" type="tns:manager_output"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="manager_output"> <xs:sequence> <xs:complexType name="metric"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="tns:metricResult"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="value" type="xs:double"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ordersList"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="tns:metricResult"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="orders"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="shortOrder"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="customerId" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="ETA" type="xs:dateTime"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="parcelId" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="pickupDate" type="xs:dateTime"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="parcelStatus" type="tns:parcelStatus"/> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="id" type="xs:ID"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="customer"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="tns:managerJobResult"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="email" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="name" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="oneTimeDiscount" type="xs:int"/> <xs:element name="permanentDiscount" type="xs:int"/> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="id" type="xs:ID"/> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="metricsResultList"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="tns:managerJobResult"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="metrics"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="adminJobKind"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="VIEW_ALL"/> <xs:enumeration value="VIEW_STAT"/> <xs:enumeration value="OFFER_DISCOUNT"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="metricType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="LATE_ORDERS"/> <xs:enumeration value="UNKNOWN_ORDERS"/> <xs:enumeration value="NB_TRANSIT"/> <xs:enumeration value="NB_STORAGE"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="parcelStatus"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="WAIT_PICKUP"/> <xs:enumeration targetNamespace="http://informatique.polytech.unice.fr/soa1/fedps/camillie/private/customer" version="1.0" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xs:element name="JobValidation" type="tns:validation"/> <xs:element name="address" type="tns:address"/> <xs:element name="box" type="tns:box"/> <xs:element name="order" nillable="true" type="xs:anyType"/> <xs:element name="parcel" type="tns:parcel"/> <xs:element name="process" type="tns:process"/> <xs:element name="processResponse" type="tns:processResponse"/> <xs:complexType name="process"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="jobs" type="tns:customer_input"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="customer_input"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="jobs"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="job" type="tns:customer_query"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="customer_query"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="fromAddress" type="tns:address"/> <xs:element name="parcelDepth" type="xs:float"/> <xs:element name="parcelHeight" type="xs:float"/> <xs:element name="parcelWeight" type="xs:float"/> <xs:element name="parcelWidth" type="xs:float"/> <xs:element name="pickupTimestamp" type="xs:long"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="quoteId" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="receiverName" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="toAddress" type="tns:address"/> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="kind" type="tns:customerJobKind" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="address"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="city" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="country" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="street" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="zip" type="xs:int"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="processResponse"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="result" type="tns:customer_output"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="customer_output"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="results"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="item" type="tns:customerJobResult"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType abstract="true" name="customerJobResult"> <xs:sequence/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="quote"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="tns:command"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="maxValidity" type="xs:dateTime"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType abstract="true" name="command"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="tns:customerJobResult"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" ref="tns:box"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="customerId" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="ETA" type="xs:dateTime"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="fromAddress" type="tns:address"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="pickupDate" type="xs:dateTime"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="price" type="xs:double"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="receiverName" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="toAddress" type="tns:address"/> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="id" type="xs:ID"/> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="box"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="depth" type="xs:float"/> <xs:element name="height" type="xs:float"/> <xs:element name="weight" type="xs:float"/> <xs:element name="width" type="xs:float"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="parcel"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="tns:box"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="status" type="tns:parcelStatus"/> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="id" type="xs:ID"/> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="order"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="tns:command"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="parcelId" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="parcelStatus" type="tns:parcelStatus"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="quotesList"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="tns:customerJobResult"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="quotes"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="quote" type="tns:quote"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="nbQuotes" type="xs:int" use="required"/> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="validation"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="tns:customerJobResult"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="isDone" type="xs:boolean"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="jobKind" type="tns:customerJobKind"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="customerJobKind"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="VIEW_QUOTES"/> <xs:enumeration value="CREATE_QUOTE"/> <xs:enumeration value="ORDER_QUOTE"/> <xs:enumeration value="CHANGE_QUOTE"/> <xs:enumeration value="DELETE_QUOTE"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="parcelStatus"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="WAIT_PICKUP"/> <xs:enumeration value="IN_TRANSIT"/> <xs:enumeration value="ARRIVAL_SCAN"/> <xs:enumeration value="STORAGE"/> <xs:enumeration value="CUSTOMS"/> <xs:enumeration value="DELIVERED"/> <xs:enumeration value="UNKNOWN"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:schema> <xsd:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="unqualified" targetNamespace="http://informatique.polytech.unice.fr/soa1/fedps/camillie/private" xmlns:tns="http://informatique.polytech.unice.fr/soa1/fedps/camillie/private"> <xsd:element name="BadJobFault" type="tns:BadJobFault"/> <xsd:complexType name="BadJobFault"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="message" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="process"> <wsdl:part element="tns:process" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="BadJobFault"> <wsdl:part element="ns1:BadJobFault" name="BadJobFault"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="processResponse"> <wsdl:part element="tns:processResponse" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="CustomerPrivateInterface"> <wsdl:operation name="process"> <wsdl:input message="tns:process" name="process"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="tns:processResponse" name="processResponse"></wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault message="tns:BadJobFault" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="process"> <soap:operation soapAction="" style="document"/> <wsdl:input name="process"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> con:request.name: create quote
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:cus="http://informatique.polytech.unice.fr/soa1/fedps/camillie/private/customer"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <cus:process> <jobs> <jobs> <job kind="CREATE_QUOTE"> <fromAddress> <city>Castel Guelfo di Bologna</city> <country>US</country> <street>P.O. Box 113, 5312 Amet St.</street> <zip>64187</zip> </fromAddress> <parcelDepth>12</parcelDepth> <parcelHeight>3.4</parcelHeight> <parcelWeight>14</parcelWeight> <parcelWidth>11</parcelWidth> <pickupTimestamp>1419739577393</pickupTimestamp> <receiverName>Raya Bray</receiverName> <toAddress> <city>Soye</city> <country>US</country> <street>892-4690 Ullamcorper, St.</street> <zip>51425</zip> </toAddress> </job> </jobs> </jobs> </cus:process> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:man="http://informatique.polytech.unice.fr/soa1/fedps/camillie/private/manager"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <man:process> <!--Optional:--> <jobs> <!--Optional:--> <jobs> <!--1 or more repetitions:--> <job kind="OFFER_DISCOUNT"> <!--non existing customer --> <customerId>925</customerId> <discount>10</discount> </job> </jobs> </jobs> </man:process> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>
